properties.Observation: Part of the existing canal has been concreted and balance part earthen canal .There is a 300-meter-long roadside ditch, 100 meters of which have been concreted, and the remaining two hundred meters need to be concreted, Command area 12 acres, The anicut is newly built.
properties.Description: Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100mm thick , 0.3m  wide  and 0.3m high canal -double banking,Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m,Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop,Miscellaneous,Contingencies 10%

properties.Observation: Existing Earthen canal, Command area 12 acres, Anicut is made as an earthen rampart.
properties.Description: Clearing the site and setting out,Construction of 1.0m high 1:3:6 (40mm) cement concrete Retaining Wall ,Supplying and fixing M.S. dowels spliced and dovetailed with wedge at one end 16mm dia. And 600mm long, boring holes to 0.3m depth in fixing,75mm tk. Stop planks (kumbuk ) with 10mm dia. 2nos. M. S. Iron hooks and applies 2 coats of hot tar.,Supply & install of 300 mm CI gate complete set including Spindle, Housing, Base plate, Closing plate, Key, Brass nut, and other required accessories. (This rate is excluding of transport of materials),Spreading , Leveling and Compacting Manually Using Standard Cast Iron Stamper or Equivalent and Filling in 150-225 mm Thick Layers (Loose Volume),Vegetative cover improving around structures (5m x 10m) with planting Arecanut seedling in 1.5m x 1.5m grid, and planting Kumbuk/ Mee/ Godapara/ Kaduru/ Aththikka/ Wal Del/ Kekuna/ randomly mixed seedlings in 3.5m x 3.5 m grid,Tidying up,Canal reservation protection by concrete lining  For  100mm thick , 0.3m  wide  and 0.3m high canal -double banking,Stream / canal  reservation protection by earthfilling of  strip   of 1.5m to 2m wide  and average Depth of 0.5m,Vegetative cover improving for narrow strips (1.5m-2.0m wide) with Arecanut seedlings at 1.5m spacing in 2 rows, Betel plants VP at 3m spacing in 1 row, Green gram as a cover crop,Contingencies 10%
